flawed_nl_solution:
Altogether, Jim has 200g + 100g + 100g = <<200+100+100=4000>>4000g of flour.
He can therefore bake 4000g / 200g = <<4000/200=20>>20 loaves of bread.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 4000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
